caption.p: Table A. Translation of quotations from French (original) to English. Quotations are presented in the same order that they appear in the Results Section. Table B. Correlation between questionnaire items related to dissatisfaction with Ebola response and/or mistrust of the Ebola response team. Agreement with all statements was quantified using an ordinal Likert scale from 1 to 5. Table C. Correlation between questionnaire items related to intentions to comply with Ebola control measures in case of Ebola illness or death in a family member.
